---
title: Webhooks Guide
---

# Setting Up Webhooks

This guide covers webhook integration.

## Using Legacy Fetch

The old way to check webhooks:

```typescript
import { legacyFetch } from 'my-sdk';

// Check webhook status
const status = legacyFetch('https://api.example.com/webhooks/status');
```

## Modern Approach

Use fetchData for better control:

```typescript
import { createClient, fetchData } from 'my-sdk';

const client = createClient('https://api.example.com', 'key');
const webhooks = fetchData(client, '/webhooks');
```
